attributes.action: Fund all necessary drugs approved for treatments by NICE using the lottery money at present wasted on futile and petty projects.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The NHS is still in dire need of money and we are constantly being told of newly developed drugs which are approved by NICE yet are then refused to patient because of lack of funds.
I have inoperable prostate cancer
My hormone treatment has failed and an MRI scan was recommended. The only MRI scanner suitable was one of two new privately run units recently inported from the USA.  In order to get my scan I had to pay nearly £500 myself.
A new drug has come on to the market recently which shows good results in the control of Prostate Cancer but this costs approx £7000 to treat someone and so it has now become a postcode lottery to get treatment.
I have paid taxes for 40 years as well as National Insurance and now find that I should really have kept my taxes back to pay for private treatments.

FUND THE NHS PROPERLY FROM THE LOTTERY AND STOP GIVING MONEY TO OPERA HOUSES AND DOME BUILDERS and other projects that waste our taxes whilst I am dying.
